main event: Observers saw an octagonal object with blinking lights flying close together with two other objects over New York City on November 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as having lights that blinked on and off,One witness reported seeing a plate-like flying object just over the buildings,Descriptions of the objects are consistent with those of an astronomical object,The length of observation varied; one report notes a single object hovered for about 5 minutes,Two witnesses reported seeing the object at the same time.
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: Civilian witnesses reported seeing the object and described its appearance with blinking lights.
